title: Pokemon: Pikachu to Pokemon Ongakutai
original_name: ポケモン・ザ・ムービー XY『ピカチュウとポケモンおんがくたい』
ending_song: "Gao Gao All Stars" by Little Glee Monster
sinopse: Pikachu and the rest of the group practice singing and dancing, as well as rehearsing their segments, until they realize Luchabull (Hawlucha) can't sing! Now it's up to Pikachu and everybody else to encourage Luchabull into getting back on cue before they have to do the show for real! Will they succeed?
